wwwjob.long_description:
Duties include: · Assisting with IT system support tickets primarily addressing, but not limited to, Microsoft Dynamics Navision (NAV) support matters · Preparing and distributing IT Helpdesk support statistical information to stakeholders · Assisting the Senior Manager, Software Developers and Business Analysts with project support as required · Completing project status reports and updates for projects · Electronic filing of documents · Assisting others in understanding core systems and approach · Providing 'NAV Champion' support and training · Supporting and working within the corporate project governance framework · Ensuring compliance with company standards, policies and procedures
Skills and experience required: · Excellent oral and written communication skills · Experience in delivering presentations and training to large groups · Desirable experience and qualifications · Knowledge of Microsoft Dynamics/Touchstone NAV · Microsoft Office products and SharePoint · Project work within a professional/financial environment · Exposure to ITSM ITIL processes
